Najveći problem LŠ igra za Briž: Iskulirao trenera i kapitena i promašio penal za bod u Parizu, a Galata ga već oterala baš zbog toga?!
Mbaje Dijanj opet puni novinske stupce
07 Nov 2019 by Dejan Stanković
Na domaćem terenu pukla je petarda, ali na Parku prinčeva je Klub Briž imao šansu kakva se retko ukazuje. Pari Sen Žermen je vodio sa 1:0, ali je Mbaje Dijanje onda iznudio penal i Belgijanci su imali zicer da izbegnu poraz od favorizovanog rivala. Hans Vanaken je krenuo ka lopti, on je uostalom dežurni izvođač jedanaesteraca kod trenera Filipa Klemona, ali Dijanje je hteo da se proslavi.
Oglušio se o naredbu šefa struke, oglušio se i o Vanakenove molbe i – očajno šutirao. Kejlor Navas mu je skinuo šut i Briž se poražen vratio kući.
Belgijska javnost je ogorčena, pa ugledni Nijuzblad u komentaru piše da je Dijanjeovo ponašanje, citiramo, neprihvatljivo, odvratno, sebično, egocentrično. Isti list traži da ga Briž pošalje na višemesečno hlađenje, iako je klub samo za pozajmicu Dijanjea iz Galatasaraja platio 3.350.000 evra s tim da ima opciju i da ga otkupi.
Trenutno se tako nešto čini apsolutno nerealnim, posebno nakon što je cela Belgija okrenula leđa 28-godišnjem napadaču. Hel Latste Nijuz, listi sa tradicijom dužom od veka, tako je prvi put u istoriji u ocenama igrača podelio i jednu – nulu! Samo je još Okereke dobio peticu, ostali ili šestice ili sedmice.“Strašno mi je žao“, sa zakašnjenjem je Dijanje shvatio šta je uradio.“Apsolutno sam pogrešio. Samo sam hteo da pomognem timu, ali sam napravio veliku grešku. Prvo bih želeo da se izvinim treneru, pa kapitenu, zatim saigračima i onda naravno navijačima. IZVINITE. Učiniću sve što mogu kako bih vam vratio ono što zaslužujete“, pokušavao je da se iskupi 191 centimetara visoki napadač.



Džaba sad. Klemon je poludeo. Saigrači su sa pravom ljuti. Navijači su mu čak i pretili po društvenim mrežama. Ovako nešto se ne radi.
I što je najgore od svega, Dijanje je to već morao da shvati, pošto mu se nešto slično desilo dok je igrao u Galatasaraju?!
Bio je 6. april 2019, Galata je igrala protiv Malatije, penal za istanbulski tim, trebalo je da ga izvede Junes Belanda. Dijanjea to ne zanima. Prilazi lopti i šutira dok saigrači odvlače Belandu. Pogodio je tada Dijanje, ali nijedan saigrač nije hteo a slavi sa njim. Vatreni navijači kakvi su Galatini to mu nisu oprostili. “Vrati se nazad u Saudijsku Arabiju“, pisalo je posle na jednom baneru.“Imam još četiri godine ugovora ovde, pošto toliko pričate o meni mislim da ću ostati“, podrugljivo je tada pisao Dijanje po društvenim mrežama.



Sada mu nije do smeha. Nikome nije. Dugu istoriju incidentata ima iza sebe. U Galati je prvo pljunuo protivničkog igrača, onda taj penal i sukob sa Belandom, pa potom i to što se nije pojavio na proslavi titule “iz porodičnih razloga“ dok je po Instagramu kačio fotografije sa novim autobilom.
U Brižu je samo nastavio po starom. Sama promocija je kasnile jer je u poslednjem trenutku rešio da mu na leđima ne piše “M. Dijanje“, nego “M. Jr. Dijanje“, jer mu se tako zove sin?! Tačno 40 minuta trebalo je zaposlenom u klubu da od trening centra ode do klupske prodavnice kako bi pokupio novi dres za promociju.
Preko toga su lako prešli mirni Belgijanci, ali su se šokirali kad su od Dijanjea tražili da individualno radi na spremi, jer je kasnio za ekipom. On je to odbio, jer mu “ne piše u ugovoru“.“Ja treniram samo sa ekipom“, odbrusio je.
Ni tu nije kraj, kod Klemona je običaj da fudbaleri koji nisu igrali odrade lakši trening posle utakmice, ali Dijanjeu nije padalo na pamet. Pravac pod tuš i kući. Zato nije ni bio u konkurenciji za prvi meč sa Pari Sen Žermenom.“Nisam da se nagledao ovih dana“, ironično je objašnjavao Klemon.
I tad su mu oprostili. Više neće. Samo 465 minuta na terenu za Mbajea Dijanjea. Šta mislite, hoće li ga otkupiti?
(FOTO: Reuters)

The biggest problem LS plays for Bruges: He trained a coach and a captain and missed a penalty kick in Paris, and Galata already kicked him out for that ?!
Mbaje Dijanj again fills newspaper columns
07 Nov 2019 by Dejan Stankovic
A firecracker cracked on the home field, but at Prince's Park, Club Bruges had a chance that was rarely indicated. Paris Saint-Germain led 1-0, but Mbaje Diyang then delivered a penalty and the Belgians had a knack for avoiding defeat by a favored rival. Hans Vanaken made his way to the ball, he is, after all, an on-duty penalty shooter under coach Philip Clemon, but Dyhan wanted to celebrate.
He obeyed the order of the chief of the profession, he disobeyed Vanaken's petitions, and - desperately kicked. Caylor Navas took his shot off and Bruges returned home.
The Belgian public is outraged, so the distinguished Niezublad writes in the commentary that Dijo's behavior is, to quote, unacceptable, disgusting, selfish, egocentric. The same sheet calls for Bruges to send him for several months to cool, although the club only paid € 3,350,000 for a loan from Diat from Galatasaray, with the option to buy him out.
At the moment, something like that seems absolutely unrealistic, especially after all of Belgium turned its back on the 28-year-old striker. Hel Latste Nues, a list with more than a century of tradition, has also split one for the first time in player ratings - zero! Only Okereke got five, six or six more weeks. "I'm terribly sorry," Diyao realized late what he had done. "I was absolutely wrong. I just wanted to help the team, but I made a big mistake. First I would like to apologize to the coach, then the captain, then the teammates and then of course the fans. Excuse me. I will do everything I can to give you back what you deserve, ”a 191-centimeter striker was trying to redeem himself.



Jaba now. Clemon went crazy. The teammates are rightly angry. Fans even threatened him on social networks. Something like this is not done.
And worst of all, Diyah must have figured it out already, since something similar happened to him while playing at Galatasaray ?!
It was April 6, 2019, Galata played against Malatya, a penalty for the Istanbul team, it was to be taken by Junes Belanda. Diacha doesn't care. He approaches the ball and kicks as teammates pull Belanda away. At the time, Dijo was hit, but no teammate wanted to celebrate with him. Fire fans such as the Galatines did not forgive him. "Go back to Saudi Arabia," it said on a banner later. "I have another four-year contract here, since you talk so much about me I think I will stay," Diyah wrote on social media at the time.



Now he's not laughing. No one did. It has a long history of incidents. In Galata, he first spat an opponent, then that penalty and clash with Belanda, and then that he did not show up to celebrate the title "for family reasons" while posting Instagram photos of the new car.
In Bruges, he just kept going. The promotion itself was delayed because at the last moment he decided not to write “M. Acting, "rather than" M. Jr. Breathing, 'cause his name is son ?! Exactly 40 minutes took the club employee from the training center to the club shop to pick up a new promotion jersey.
The quiet Belgians were easily crossed, but they were shocked when they asked Diyach to work individually on the draft as he was late for the team. He refused because he "doesn't write in his contract." "I only train with the team," he brushed off.
This is not the end either, it is a custom for Clemons that non-playing football players do an easier workout after the game, but it does not occur to DIY. Directions to the shower and home. That's why he wasn't even in competition for the first match with Paris Saint-Germain. "I didn't watch myself these days," Clemon explained ironically.
And then they forgave him. No more. Only 465 minutes on the pitch for Mbaje Diyao. What do you think, will he buy it?
